          <title>
            <string language="hu">Szomjas (bólogató) kacsa</string>
            <string language="en">thirsty (nodding) duck</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">durstige (nickende) Ente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">canard (d'inclination de tête) altéré</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pato (assentindo) thirsty</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">anatra (di cenno del capo) assetata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διψασμένη (κουνώντας) πάπια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pato (de cabeceo) sediento</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Szomjas (bólogató) kacsa működésének szemléltetése</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstration of working of the thirsty (nodding) duck</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">fizika, kacsa, bólogat, bólogató, bólogató kacsa, szomjas, víz, inni, iszik</string>
            <string language="en">Physics, duck, nodd, nodding, nodding duck, thirsty, water, to drink, drink</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstration der Funktion der durstigen 
(nickenden) Ente</string>
          </description>
          <description>

(d'inclination de tête) altéré</string>

          </description>
          <description>

πάπιας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostración del funcionamiento del pato (de 
cabeceo) sediento</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik, Ente, nodd, Nicken, die Ente, durstig, Wasser 
nickend, zum Getränk, Getränk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique, canard, nodd, inclination de tête, inclinant 
la tête le canard, altéré, l'eau, à la boisson, boisson</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Física, pato, nodd, assentir, assentindo o pato, 
thirsty, água, à bebida, bebida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fisica, anatra, nodd, annuire col capo, annuente col

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική, πάπια, nodd, να κουνήσει, να κουνήσει πάπια,

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Física, pato, nodd, cabeceo, cabeceando el pato, 
sediento, agua, a la bebida, bebida</string>
